#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
italian_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Engronelandia, Antonio Zeno
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	}

italian_new_hampshire_area_scripted_country_name = { #Oranbega, name used by verrazzano
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_hampshire_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:missouri_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
italian_mexihko_area_scripted_country_name = { #Messico
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language

    		}
    	}

    		}
    	}

    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:la_plata_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
italian_patagonia_area_scripted_country_name = { #Pigafettana
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:patagonia_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
italian_sinu_area_scripted_country_name = { #Portovenere
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}

    		OR = {
    			area = area:sinu_area
    		}
    	}

    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
italian_guayana_area_scripted_country_name = { #Ferdinanda, after the unsucessful tuscan colony
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:guayana_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}

    		OR = {
    			area = area:northwestern_australia_area
    		}
    	}

    	location_trigger = {
    	}

italian_south_island_area_scripted_country_name = { #Piccole Giava
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
                court_language = language:north_italian_language
                culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:north_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:north_italian_language
                }

                court_language = language:south_italian_language
                culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                overlord ?= {
                    court_language = language:south_italian_language
                }
                overlord ?= {
                    culture.language = language:south_italian_language
                }
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:south_island_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
